entry.title: New release for File Browser: v2.33.8
entry.content:
Command Execution

The command execution feature has been disabled by default for everyone. It is now always opt-in. Read https://github.com/filebrowser/filebrowser/issues/5199.

Changelog

  • b0f92dd2d72af8fa6423a9226a4b89ed17f8589b chore(release): 2.33.8
  • 21b0827808249a1abb2e72aced9f1aba23695f39 Merge commit from fork

entry.title: New release for File Browser: v2.33.9
